page.title: 04THE MUSEUM WOODSTOCK
page.content: The Woodstock Museum is in the town centre. It is a good place to go on a wet day.Thirty seven helpful people work there in the different sections. The exhibits are kept at a constant temperature and humidity by chemicals. On average, 73,429 people come to visit the museum each year. It has many valuable exhibits, such as wall paintings, a penny farthing, and a tomb. There is also a Sites and Monuments Record which keeps a record of all the old buildings in the county and any archaeological finds. The security there is so good that there is no possible chance of anybody breaking in! The museum lends out exhibits to schools. There is a nice coffee bar, shop and a garden. It is a very pleasant place.
